response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $750,000. This is a significant discount from its true worth, reflecting my desire to find the right person who appreciates its true value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 750000}
